duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee day-to-day operations of the site, focusing on safety and security for students and staff.
Provide leadership and vision to the FM team with oversight of Hard and Soft services.
Ensure service provision through personal development plans and regular 1-to-1s, and meet objectives.
Work with demanding stakeholders and provide reporting and reassurance to the SPV board.
Maintain health and safety awareness and statutory compliance across the site.
Ensure adherence to expected working methods and training for the soft services division.
Take responsibility for student experience on the residential campus and represent the scheme at regular cross-scheme meetings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
